description.p: The ability to channel and manipulate raw arcane power does not belong to sorcerers alone. A few wizards and bards have learned to dominate the chaotic energy of change itself, leading them along a narrow path that circles a pit of madness. Cling to the path, and avoid slipping into that roiling pit, and you will be rewarded with the power to alter reality through strength of will alone.
Deep Magic: Chaos Magic brings the secrets of chaos magic into your 5th Edition campaign, featuring:

ul.li: A new Chaos Magic wizard school and a bardic College of Entropy
A random Chaos Magic Surge table, for those times when reality gets away from you
17 new spells, including shifting the odds, entropic damage field, chaotic form, and more!
